monster.name: Orc Brute

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh’s Fury
trait.text: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included)

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 3 + 1d8) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: The orc brute is precisely what it sounds like, big, mean, stupid, and vicious. Don’t get in its way. ------ Source: D&D Denizens: Orcs

monster.name: Orc Campaigner

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The orc campaigner makes two melee attacks with its Greataxe or its Javelin (reach 5ft)

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

monster.description: A scarred grizzled veteran of many battles in many places, the orc campaigner has seen it all. Or at least, that’s what he would have you believe. And aside from the bloodletting, he didn’t like any of it. ------ Source: D&D Denizens: Orcs

monster.name: Orc Fury

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Beserk
trait.text: Every time the orc fury reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it must make a DC 8 Wisdom saving throw. If it fails, then on its next turn it moves toward the nearest creature it can see (unless it is already within reach of one), treating all creatures on the battlefield as hostile. It then attacks a randomly determined creature within its reach.

trait.name: Brute
trait.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the orc fury hits with it (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Reckless
trait.text: At the start of its turn, the orc fury can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monster.description: Nobody likes to see an orc fury coming at them in combat, not even another orc who’s on the same side. Once they start swinging, furies have a hard time stopping, no matter who gets in the way. ------ Source: D&D Denizens: Orcs

monster.name: Orc Sniffer

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The orc sniffer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell and on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track a creature by smell.

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used in two hands.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.description: Sniffers are usually small and wiry, more akin to a big goblin or hobgoblin in stature. They are no less vicious or bloodthirsty than other orcs, though, and they are very fond of the flesh of other sapient creatures. They pride themselves on being good trackers. ------ Source: D&D Denizens: Orcs

monster.name: Orc Soldier

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
